description:
By Deeba Ahmed

Over 1.2 million records were exposed in a major data breach at UK security firm Amberstone. Learn the potential impact, what to do if affected, and how to stay secure.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Major UK Security Provider Leaks Trove of Guard and Suspect Data
title: Major UK Security Provider Leaks Trove of Guard and Suspect Data

description:
By Waqas

In a major blow to ransomware, international law enforcement has unmasked Dmitry Yuryevich Khoroshev, the leader of LockBit ransomware. Learn about the takedown, sanctions imposed, and the future of LockBit in a post-Khoroshev era.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Feds Unmask LockBit Ransomware Leader as Dmitry Yuryevich Khoroshev
title: Feds Unmask LockBit Ransomware Leader as Dmitry Yuryevich Khoroshev

title: Hunters Announces Full Adoption of OCSF and Introduces OCSF-Native Search

description:
By Waqas

UK Ministry of Defence (MoD) faces potential Chinese cyberattack. Learn more about the details of the alleged attack, China's role in cyberspace, potential consequences, and the importance of international cooperation in cybersecurity.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: China Suspected in Major Cyberattack on UK’s Ministry of Defence (MoD)
title: China Suspected in Major Cyberattack on UK’s Ministry of Defence (MoD)

description:
By Deeba Ahmed

A massive data leak of 820,000 Dominicans' personal information (including COVID vaccination status) has been leaked online puting individuals at risk of identity theft, scams, and social engineering attacks.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Hackers Leak COVID-19 Data of 820K Dominicans, Including Vaccination Info
title: Hackers Leak COVID-19 Data of 820K Dominicans, Including Vaccination Info
